channel.title: Legacy614 Player Rendering Help Please ASAP!
channel.description:
Ok well I got the Legacy614 source and I got a working client with it. I also got everything else working up to when I log into the game. I cant see my character. I know that lots of other people probably have this too so if anyone could help me with this it would probably help many others. I've searched for a long time and I cannot find this fix so please help me guys!! Also, I was just wondering, when my cache is named "revengescapecache" the client connects fine and loads to the log in screen but if I name it anything different my client gets stuck at 0% and doesnt load to the log in screen. It's wierd but if anyone also has a fix for that the help would be highly appreciated. Thanks!!!!
Screenshots:
Player Rendering Problem [url=http://imageshack.us/f/714/pleasefix.jpg/]ImageShack® - Online Photo and Video Hosting[/url]
Cache Problem:
With "revengescapecache" as the name: [url=http://imageshack.us/f/8/pleasefix2.jpg/]ImageShack® - Online Photo and Video Hosting[/url]
With any other name: [url=http://imageshack.us/f/812/pleasefix3.jpg/]ImageShack® - Online Photo and Video Hosting[/url]
Srry for just the links to the screenshots, i couldnt get it showing up on the post
-Hockeysum

item.title: Legacy614 Player Rendering Help Please ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @Hockeysum Hockeysum
item.description:
@Hockeysum wrote:

Ok well I got the Legacy614 source and I got a working client with it. I also got everything else working up to when I log into the game. I cant see my character. I know that lots of other people probably have this too so if anyone could help me with this it would probably help many others. It’s wierd but if anyone also has a fix for that the help would be highly appreciated. Thanks!!!
